thread.title: One Direction, Selena Gomez to headline at L.A. Jingle Ball
thread.title_full: One Direction, Selena Gomez to headline at L.A. Jingle Ball - UPI.com

author: upi.com
title: One Direction, Selena Gomez to headline at L.A. Jingle Ball
text:
1 of 3 | License Photo LOS ANGELES, Oct. 5 (UPI) -- December's annual occurrence of iHeartRadio's Jingle Ball throughout the country will bring headliners One Direction, Selena Gomez , 5 Seconds of Summer and The Weeknd, among others, to cities like Dallas, Los Angeles and Miami.
While Los Angeles will house the artists previously mentioned on Dec. 4, alongside the likes of Ellie Goulding , Shawn Mendes and Tove Lo, cities like Dallas, San Francisco and Minneapolis will also see acts like Calvin Harris and R. City.
This year, the music celebration that become a staple during the holiday season will hit 11 cities in the United States including Philadelphia, Boston, New York, Washington, D.C., Chicago, Miami and Tampa. Pre-sale tickets to the event go on sale Tuesday, Oct. 6 while public sales start Monday, Oct. 12.
The remaining lineups for Jingle Ball events still unannounced will go public Monday at 5:00 p.m.. As of Monday morning, the dates and lineups for each city are listed below.
Dec. 1 -- Dallas, Texas One Direction, Calvin Harris, Demi Lovato , 5 Seconds of Summer, Ellie Goulding, Zedd, Shawn Mendes, Tove Lo, Charlie Puth, DNCE
Dec. 3 -- San Francisco/Oakland, Calif. Selena Gomez, Calvin Harris, Demi Lovato, Nick Jonas , Tove Lo, Shawn Mendes, R. City, Conrad Sewell, Alessia Cara, DNCE
Dec. 4 -- Los Angeles, Calif. One Direction, The Weeknd, Selena Gomez, 5 Seconds of Summer, Ellie Goulding, Shawn Mendes, Tove Lo, Charlie Puth, Zedd, Hailee Steinfeld , Conrad Sewell, DNCE
Dec. 7 -- Minneapolis/St. Paul, Minn. Calvin Harris, Demi Lovato, Fall Out Boy, Nick Jonas, Zedd, Shawn Mendes, Charlie Puth, Tove Lo, R. City, Hailee Steinfeld, Becky G, DNCE
Dec. 9 -- Philadelphia, Penn. To be announced.
Dec. 10 -- Boston, Mass. The Weeknd, Calvin Harris, 5 Seconds of Summer, Demi Lovato, Nick Jonas, Tove Lo, Hailee Steinfeld, Natalie La Rose
Dec. 11 - New York, N.Y. To be announced.
Dec. 14 -- Washington, D.C. To be announced.
Dec. 16 -- Chicago, Ill. 5 Seconds of Summer, Selena Gomez, Nick Jonas, Fifth Harmony, Shawn Mendes, Tove Lo, Charlie Puth, Hailee Steinfeld, R. City, DNCE
Dec. 18 -- Miami/Ft. Lauderdale, Fla. To be announced.
Dec. 19 -- Tampa, Fla. To be announced.
